Learn language in 5 weeks

Learning new languages have never been easier. With our website you can lean, polish and master one of the languages from the offer. If you're brave enough and not afraid of challenges, this course is just right for you! Check it

Our main advantages

01 Guarantee of effectiveness Our most valuable priority is to provide you the best quality and effective lessons that will teach you your chosen language as fast as possible. Our students in june's sessions in 2016-2018 have passed FCE, CAE and CPE with success rate around 95%.
02 Method of teaching In 5 Week Lang we're focused on our lessons to be as entertaining and dynamic as it can be. We're trying to motivate you so that you can consolidate knowledge acquired on lessons and by doing that reaching your goals.
03 Anytime, anywhere When you're away or you don't feel like leaving your house, you can always use our online courses. Every homework is online on our website, so whether you're on mobile or computer you can always do it and you won't have any excuses.
04 Atmosphere In a good atmosphere you learn a lot faster and that what you'll find here. You'll meet here interesting and friendly people and your lector will be your counselor.
05 Equipment Every class is equipped with multimedia devices, white board, big round table and comfortable chairs. This whole packages makes every lesson a lot better than you can imagine.
06 Second language free If you feel like you need to learn another language - that's not a problem. Choose one of languages from our offer and enjoy additional classes completely for FREE.
